note:
OH!CON is the Outer Hebrides' Comic Con.
Sci-fi, fantasy, comics, games and all that stuff.

Rhymes with "rock." Actual human comic book writer, filmmaker, photographer. 35mm Love Letter, Mech Cadet Yu, Planet Hulk, Darth Vader, Ronin Island, Princess Who Saved. Get vaxxed, get out the vote. He/Him.

Love #Comics #ClassicMovies #Fantasy #SciFi #DarkFiction #WeirdLit #Literature #SwordAndSorcery #RareBooks #Renaissance #ShortStories #Blues #Dylan #Poetry #Shakespeare #Folklore #Anthropology #Archaeology #History #Astronomy #ArtHistory #DarkAcademia #Illustration #Sculpture #Architecture #Design #FilmPhotography #StreetPhotography

I love words, patterns, London, being #queer. I'm curious about almost everything. I like human beings, in general. I adore my husband.  Anyway, it’s taken me 42 years to realise I’m #trans, do you really trust me to tell you who I am?    I’m still trying to figure it out, honestly.

note:
I am an archaeologist specializing in the Neolithic and Bronze Age. I have worked at sites between southwestern Asia and Central Europe. Doctoral thesis on 4000+ Bronze Age socketed axes, 11+ years at Early Neolithic Göbekli Tepe, now @MuseumHalle.  

Married to @lauradietrich.

Opinions / images my own.  

#archaeology #SciComm #CulturalHeritage #MaterialCulture #museum #prehistory #AncientNearEast #PrehistoricEurope #Neolithic #BronzeAge #archäologie
